reviewText:
The title already did the explanation for this game.
You are controlling a Hypership that is out of control. (Yep you read it right, controlling something that is out of control.)

I can't say this game is in a category of Shoot 'Em Up since it doesn't really require you to shoot things. (There are many undestructable object).
Your job is to evade all the objects and make your way throughout the waves.
The game itself is fast paced. you start with a normal speed and the speed will keep on increasing every seconds.
It will only dropped if you're dead.

Considering the price, it's also not a bad game for a quick entertainment.

reviewText:
Really simple graphics, really simple (but nice) music, really simple idea and really simple gameplay.
And yet this game is really simple...simply brilliant!
How? No idea, but whenever I have few minutes to spare, I play this game.
Give it a chance, don't let small price and simplicity fool you. :)
voteText: 2 of 2 people (100%) found this review helpful

reviewText:
'Fun Infused Games' delivers just what it says on the label. A very simple, very fun game with tight controls and a charming aesthetic.  They've done a good job with the trailer and screenshots - what you see is what you get.

This is probably the first shmup I've played in which the levels can be snarky.

Absolutely worth the tiny full price.  Controls wonderfully with a gamepad.
